Articles.Content: Hello fellow Kerbals! I am CodyTheJoker and possible the saddest player out there! I use the version '1.2.2' Non-Steam which is pretty bad on my part. I really love this game, I would like this to be free as soon as it can be!

Quote

I use the version '1.2.2' Non-Steam 

The what, now? 

Welcome to the forum.

Greetings and welcome to the forum, @CodyTheJoker.

The very early versions of KSP and the demo are free so players can try before they buy.  I don't agree that newer versions be made free as this might hamper continued development.

Welcome to the forums!

Why play an older version?

Where are you getting your versions from? If you tell me, I could prolly point you to the newest one.
